resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157377</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3222</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teens at Risk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teens an der Gefahr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Années de l'adolescence en danger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teens no risco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anni dell'adolescenza al rischio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Teens σε κίνδυνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adolescencias en el riesgo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online activity on the risks of drugs and alcohol.The activity is based to a large extent on a poem which the students read. Includes an evaluation rubric for the activity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">addiction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teenagers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alcohol</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interaktives Online-Dienst auf den Gefahren 
der Drogen und der alcohol.The Aktivität basiert in hohem Grade auf 
einem Gedicht, das die Kursteilnehmer lesen. Enthält eine 
Auswertung Rubrik für die Aktivität.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne interactive sur les 
risques des drogues et de l'activité d'alcohol.The est basée 
largement sur une poésie que les étudiants lisent. Inclut une 
rubrique d'évaluation pour l'activité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha interativa nos riscos das 
drogas e da atividade de alcohol.The é baseada a uma extensão grande
em um poema que os estudantes leiam. Inclui um rubric da 
avaliação para a atividade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea interattiva sui rischi di 
droghe e di attività di alcohol.The è basata in larga misura su un 
poem che gli allievi leggono. Include una rubrica di valutazione
per l'attività.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα στους
κινδύνους των ναρκωτικών και οινοπνεύματος Η δραστηριότητα 
είναι βασισμένη σε μεγάλο βαθμό σε ένα ποίημα που οι σπουδαστές
διαβάζουν. Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης για τη 
δραστηριότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea interactiva en los 
riesgos de drogas y de la actividad de alcohol.The se basa a un 
fragmento grande en un poema que los estudiantes lean. Incluye 
una rúbrica de la evaluación para la actividad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jugendliche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiritus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">addiction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
